general.title: General Information
general.text: Protecting your personal data is important to me. This website is a private, non-commercial portfolio and complies with applicable data protection regulations (GDPR).

responsible.title: Controller
responsible.text: The controller responsible for data processing on this website is:

hosting.title: Hosting via GitHub Pages
hosting.text: This website is hosted on GitHub Pages (GitHub, Inc., 88 Colin P Kelly Jr St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA). When accessing the site, GitHub automatically collects technical information (e.g., IP address, browser type, operating system, access time). This data is processed to ensure security and stability and is automatically deleted after a short period. Data may be transferred to the USA. GitHub has committed to EU data protection standards (including the EU–US Data Privacy Framework).

firebase.title: Contact Form via Firebase
firebase.text: For my contact form, I use Google Firebase (Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland). When you submit the form, the data you enter (such as name, email address, message) is processed and transmitted securely via Firebase. Firebase may also log technical data (e.g., IP address, device information, timestamp) to ensure reliable operation and prevent misuse. Data may be transferred to servers in the USA. Google participates in the EU–US Data Privacy Framework and applies Standard Contractual Clauses.

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.text: The sole purpose of processing your personal data is to respond to your inquiries and enable communication with you. Your data will not be used for marketing purposes.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: I store your data only as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry or as required by law. Afterwards, the data will be deleted.

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact me by email.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: Please note that data transmission over the internet (e.g., email or form submission) may have security gaps. Complete protection against access by third parties is not possible. However, I take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.
